## OWebI18n.loadLangData() method

Sets the i18n lang data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static loadLangData(lang: string, data: OI18nDefinition): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lang | string | The i18n lang code |
|  data | [OI18nDefinition](./oweb.oi18ndefinition.md) | The i18n lang data. |

void
